Response Append.description: Appends the specified value to the HTTP response header field.

Response Attachment.description: Sets the HTTP response Content-Disposition header field to attachment.

Response Cookie.description: Sets cookie name to value. The value parameter may be a string or object converted to JSON.

Response Cookie With Options.description: Sets cookie name to value. The value parameter may be a string or object converted to JSON.

Response Clear Cookie.description: Clears the cookie specified by name.

Response Clear Cookie With Options.description: Clears the cookie specified by name.

Response Download.description: Transfers the file at path as an attachment. Typically, browsers will prompt the user for download.

Response Format.description: Performs content-negotiation on the Accept HTTP header on the request object, when present.

Response Get.description: Returns the HTTP response header specified by field. The match is case-insensitive.

Response Jsonp.description: Sends a JSON response with JSONP support.

Response Links.description: Joins the links provided as properties of the parameter to populate the response’s Link HTTP header field.

Response Location.description: Sends a JSON response with JSONP support.

Response Redirect.description: Redirects to the URL derived from the specified path.

Response Redirect With Status.description: Redirects to the URL derived from the specified path, with specified status, a positive integer that corresponds to an HTTP status code.

Response Render.description: Renders a view and sends the rendered HTML string to the client.

Response Send File.description: Transfers the file at the given path.

Response Send Status.description: Sets the response HTTP status code to statusCode and send its string representation as the response body.

Response Set.description: Sets the response’s HTTP header field to value. To set multiple fields at once, pass an object as the parameter.

Response Status.description: Sets the HTTP status for the response.

Response Type.description: Sets the Content-Type HTTP header to the MIME type as determined by mime.lookup() for the specified type.

Response Vary.description: Adds the field to the Vary response header, if it is not there already.
